picked_headlines.summary: Hybrid quantum-classical models outperform CNNs in image classification.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a significant advancement in AI technology, showcasing the potential of hybrid models in improving image classification accuracy and efficiency, making it relevant for both technical and managerial audiences.

picked_headlines.summary: InfraMind: A new GUI framework for industrial management.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: InfraMind addresses critical automation challenges in industrial management, offering innovative solutions that appeal to both engineers and stakeholders interested in operational efficiency and safety.

digest:
- *Slim-SC* improves LLM efficiency by pruning redundant reasoning chains, maintaining accuracy. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.13990
- *Co-Investigator AI* enhances AML compliance by generating accurate SARs faster. Discover the details: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.08380
- *$Agent^2$* automates RL agent design using LLMs, improving performance and accessibility. Explore further: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.13368
- *Evolution Meets Diffusion* combines evolutionary algorithms with diffusion models for efficient neural architecture generation. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17827
- *Synthesizing Behaviorally-Grounded Reasoning Chains* for personal finance LLMs integrates behavioral finance for better advice. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.14180
- *Uni-CoT* proposes a unified framework for multimodal reasoning, enhancing LLMs with efficient visual state transitions. More info: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.05606
- *Re-purposing SAM* into efficient visual projectors for RIS reduces token count by 93% while maintaining performance. Details here: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.13676
- *State Space Models over Directed Graphs* introduces DirGraphSSM, enhancing causal dependency learning. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.13735
- *LLM Agents for Interactive Workflow Provenance* presents a novel architecture for analyzing complex workflow provenance data. Discover more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.13978
- *MOCHA* enables efficient knowledge transfer from multimodal to lightweight object detectors. Explore further: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.14001
